title: Adapter
description: Defines the DSC Resource as a DSC Resource Adapter. A DSC Resource Adapter enables users to manage resources that don't have their own manifests with DSC.

list.title: List Command
list.description: Defines how DSC must call the DSC Resource Adapter to list its supported DSC Resources.

args.title: Command arguments
args.description: Defines the list of arguments to pass to the command to return the list of supported DSC Resources.

config.title: Expected Configuration
config.description: Defines whether the adapter expects to receive a full and unprocessed configuration as a single JSON blob over stdin or a sequence of JSON Lines for each child resource's configurations.
